name: Buried Treasure (Juliette Amorati)
description:
Daryl “Fetch” Zeal is on a mission. He’s all about finding treasure, the buried kind. And no, he’s not a pirate. Nonetheless, Daryl, armed with just the shovel he found in his backyard shed, likes to head to the park to find as many lost valuables as he can.

Of course, Daryl didn’t get nicknamed “Fetch” for no reason. He has a near paranormal skill for knowing where to dig. He’s been honing his skills since he was a young boy, and now he knows if he’s standing near a buried cache or not.

The one skill he doesn’t have, though, is knowing whether the items he’s detected are valuable or not. Sometimes Daryl digs up miscellaneous and pretty useless items. But today feels lucky.

How many pieces of buried treasure will he uncover today?
